papers.title: Introducing the Role of Shaping Order K in Set Shaping Theory
papers.excerpt: This article introduces the pivotal role of K in the Set Shaping Theory, shedding light on its implications for data compression and transformation dynamics.

projects.title: localGoogoo
projects.excerpt: A search engine for offline websites, saves you the hassle of manually looking for information in your local websites you've saved offline.

projects.title: Arithmetic Coding Library
projects.excerpt: An implementation of the Arithmetic Coding algorithm in Python, along with adaptive statistical data compression models like PPM, Context Mixing and Simple Adaptive models.

projects.title: Kodra
projects.excerpt: A checkers game engine playing the russian variation (Shashki) at master level, built for the CheckerBoard interface.

projects.title: Chip8 Emulator
projects.excerpt: A chip8 emulator, an interpreter for the chip8 programming language.
